#### Bio
Wouter van Amsterdam is an assistant professor at the University Medical Center Utrecht, working on methods and applications of machine learning and causal inference for health care.

Master students with a background in statistics or machine learning who want to work with me are welcome to contact me.
Students enrolled at Utrecht University or UMC Utrecht can find open master projects on [konjoin](https://uu.konjoin.nl/profile/wouter-van-amsterdam)

#### Education
**University Medical Center Utrecht / Utrecht University** 

BSc. in Physics | 2010\
M.D. | 2017\
MSc. in epidemiology (med. statistics track) | 2021\
PhD. machine learning for healthcare | 2022 | co-advised by [Rajesh Ranganath](https://cims.nyu.edu/~rajeshr/) from NYU

#### Experience

**Babylon Health** | Senior Research Scientist | 2021 - 2023
